TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter

Docs.summary: 定義用於寫入 的方法和屬性。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>方法，以取得<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>寫入器來新增<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>內容<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]

Docs.returns: 用於輸出新 的寫入器。

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail AddThumbnail(valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType imageType) cil managed
Public Function AddThumbnail (imageType As XpsImageType) As XpsThumbnail

block.para: 只有一個縮圖影像可以代表整個文件序列 （雖然個別的文件和頁面可以有自己的縮圖影像）。 則會擲回時，會呼叫已經縮圖。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: 清除並關閉 寫入器。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A>方法來清除和關閉<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>寫入器。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Printing::PrintTicket ^ PrintTicket { void set(System::Printing::PrintTicket ^ value); };

remarks.format:
## Remarks 設定這個屬性不會驗證或修改指定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。 如果需要使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>這是適用於指定的印表機。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A>相關聯屬性<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>與<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>。
[!code-cpp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]
